table_description: Documents race win data from 1950-2020, detailing venue, winner, team, and race duration.

table_columns.name: venue
table_columns.description: Venue where the race was held.

table_columns.name: date
table_columns.description: Date of the race in the format 'DD Mon YYYY'.

table_columns.name: name_tag
table_columns.description: Tag associated with the driver's name.

table_columns.name: laps
table_columns.description: Number of laps completed in the race.
